item.title: MariaDB
item.description: If you host your own instance of MariaDB, you can run it with logs to examine statements by following the guide at Query log output destination References Resource URL Log output https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/general-query-log/#choosing-the-general-query-log-output-destination MariaDB Docker https://hub.docker.com/_/mariadb/
